text: Heinrich Boere (27 September 1921 – 1 December 2013) was a convicted German- Dutch war criminal and former member of the Waffen-SS. He was one of the most wanted Nazis during the 1940s. Boere was born in Eschweiler, Germany to a Dutch father and German mother. Boere began serving his life sentence on 16 December 2011 at the age of 90. He died on 1 December 2013 in prison custody in Fröndenberg from natural causes, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Germany: Trial opens of former SS member Heinrich Boere, wsws.org 2 November 2009 * Life imprisonment for SS man Heinrich Boere, wsws.org 3 April 2010 Category:1921 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Dutch military personnel of World War II Category:German prisoners Category:German war criminals Category:People from Eschweiler Category:People who died in prison custody Category:Waffen-SS people
title: Heinrich Boere
